sql-statement.sql: from op_mashang maShangeModel left join op_user userModel on maShangeModel.createdBy = userModel.id where 1 = 1 <% commonSql("com.common.params",filters!,sorts!); %>

select maShangeInstructionModel.*,userModel.displayName,departmentModel.name as departmentName from op_mashang_instruction maShangeInstructionModel left join op_user userModel on maShangeInstructionModel.userId = userModel.id left join op_department departmentModel on userModel.departmentId = departmentModel.id where mashangId = ${mashangId}

select maShangeFollowModel.*,userModel.displayName,departmentModel.name as departmentName from op_mashang_follow maShangeFollowModel left join op_user userModel on maShangeFollowModel.userId = userModel.id left join op_department departmentModel on userModel.departmentId = departmentModel.id where mashangId = ${mashangId}
